name: Guardian of Azeroth
description:
Call upon Azeroth to summon a Guardian of Azeroth for 30 sec who impales your target with spikes of Azerite every 2.5 sec that deal 157 Fire damage. Every 8 sec, the Guardian launches a volley of Azerite Spikes at its target, dealing 127 Fire damage to all nearby enemies.

Each time the Guardian of Azeroth casts a spell, you gain 2% Haste, stacking up to 5 times. This effect ends when the Guardian of Azeroth despawns.
